video_prompt: A sorceress strides gracefully forward, her long, dark hair flowing, with a serene, focused gaze subtly shifting upward. Electric blue energy swirls and radiates from her left hand, expanding through gothic architecture, illuminating glowing star-like particles and floating sigils connecting with light lines. Vibrant orange and yellow flames spiral dramatically from her right hand, wrapping around her lower body and emanating outwards, igniting a pulsating floor sigil. Deep sapphire light pulsates from distant stained-glass windows, while mystical blue energy drifts across ancient arches and columns, causing shadowy foreground elements to subtly writhe.
image_prompt: A powerful and elegant young sorceress, full body, with long dark wavy hair and a serene expression, wearing an intricately patterned shimmering silver off-the-shoulder gown and an ornate necklace. She gracefully wields both swirling celestial electric blue energy (with glowing stars and floating sigils from her left hand) and vibrant fiery orange and yellow flames (spiraling from her right hand, interacting with a glowing floor sigil). She stands within a mystical gothic cathedral interior featuring towering dark stone arches, heavy columns, and majestic glowing sapphire stained-glass rose windows. Epic fantasy, high detail, dramatic lighting, immersive, immense power.
refined_video_prompt: The sorceress strides forward, her dark hair flowing as her serene gaze subtly shifts. Electric blue energy swirls and radiates from her left hand, expanding through the architecture, illuminating glowing particles and floating, connecting sigils. Vibrant flames spiral from her right, wrapping and emanating outwards, igniting a pulsating floor sigil. Deep sapphire light pulsates from windows, while mystical blue energy drifts across arches, causing shadowy foreground elements to subtly writhe.
